title: COME CHECK OUT OUR MINI STUDIOS NEAR SANTANA ROW!!
posting_body: Macy Bennett | Valley Village Retirement Community |
390 N Winchester Blvd, Santa Clara, CA 95050
Call now for a property tour to be added to our short waitlist and see our community.
Due to Social distancing, we are providing you a link to see more from a distance.
Community Tours are offered Monday - Friday.
We also invite you to join our Open House which will take place on August 6.
You can call for an appointment, book with the link, or scan the QR code above to reserve a time.
The Classic Mini Studios features Premier packages to fit every 55+ lifestyles.
Utilities, Garbage & Water are included in the rent
We offer storage space for your convenience
Washer & Dryer facilities located in each building
Free transportation service within a 10 mile radius 5 days/week
Note: No kitchenette; microwave and mini refrigerator provided
Applicants must be 55 years of age or older.
Rates are not exempt from rental increases.
Pets are welcomed: (1) 30 lbs. or less, additional $300.00 deposit, current vaccination, and licensing.
Carports are available for an additional $35.00 a month

* * Valley Village does not deny admission to applicants based on race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, national origin, ancestry, source of income, medical condition, genetic information, or disability.
We conduct business in accordance with applicable Federal and California Fair Housing Laws.
The apartments and over-all premises at Valley Village comply with Federal and California Fair Housing Laws.
Applicants must be 55 years of age or older.
Must be 55 years of age or older
Utilities, Garbage & Water and Comcast Cable are included in the rent
We offer storage space for your convenience
Washer & Dryer facilities located in each building
Free transportation service within a 10 mile radius 5 days/week
** 3 Meals a day plus weekly housekeeping/linen service are included in some packages!
